question: Which company has won the bid for the largest segment of Mumbai - Ahmedabad high speed rail project?
explanation:
Larsen & Toubro (L&T) has bagged the order for construction of the largest segment of Mumbai Ahmedabad high speed rail project. The project involves construction of high speed bullet train infrastructure of 237.1 km.
L&T had made a bid for Rs.24,985 crore, which emerged as the lowest price compared to other two bidders namely Tata Projects and Afcons Infrastructure Ltd.
